scripts.now: cp -fR packages/core packages/real-estate && mv -f packages/real-estate/package.json packages/real-estate/_package.json && cp -f packages/core/package.json packages/real-estate/package.json && cd packages/real-estate && now --static --force && rm -f package.json && mv -f _package.json package.json && rm -fR core
scripts.static-re: cd packages/real-estate && NODE_ENV=production LOCAL=true yarn generate
